title: Rainy night city driving with multiple braking events.
caption: A blue car drives slowly down a rainy city street at night, with multiple braking events.
context: This clip is from ego vehicle index 2 in the CARLA simulation. Weather is rainy (softRainNight). The ego vehicle is moving slowly (average speed â‰ˆ 3.7 m/s). There are 6 braking events or strong decelerations in this window.
description: The road is wet from the rain, and there are several other cars on the street. The traffic lights are visible in the distance, and there is a large building on the right side of the road. The weather is dark and rainy, with visibility slightly reduced.
reasoning: The ego vehicle is driving slowly to maintain safety in the rainy conditions. It slows down or brakes when approaching intersections or other vehicles, and it keeps a safe distance from other cars on the road. The driver is cautious and attentive, adjusting the speed and direction according to the changing traffic situation.
